exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="game_bg_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group id="fallPacketGroup" height="1150" width="640"/>
	<e:Group id="itemGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image id="item_paper0" source="game_paper0_png" x="-4" y="709"/>
		<e:Image id="item_paper1" source="game_paper1_png" x="350" y="219"/>
		<e:Image id="item_p0" source="game_fall_png" x="100" y="377" rotation="30" anchorOffsetX="109" anchorOffsetY="127"/>
		<e:Image id="item_p1" source="game_fall_png" x="457" y="65" width="140" height="162"/>
		<e:Image id="item_p2" source="game_fall_png" x="460" y="688" width="331" height="383" rotation="30"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="arrow" source="game_arrow_png" y="394" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="staticPacket" source="game_packet_png" y="595" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Group id="countGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true"/>
	<e:Group id="labelGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" touchThrough="true" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="false">
		<e:Image id="moneybg" source="game_moneybg_png" y="15" x="199"/>
		<e:Label id="packetLabel" text="999" y="26" width="150" height="50" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xFFFFFF" size="35" x="250"/>
		<e:Label id="timeLabel" y="90" text="999" width="150" height="50" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xFFFFFF" x="250" size="35"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="home_bg_png"/>
	<e:Group height="200" width="640" x="0" bottom="216">
		<e:Image id="gonglueBtn" source="home_gonglue_png" x="196" y="249"/>
		<e:Image id="startBtn" source="home_start_png" x="322" y="104" width="444" height="186" anchorOffsetX="222" anchorOffsetY="93"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="gonglueGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.8"/>
		<e:Image source="home_gongluebg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="OpenSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="open_bg_png" width="640" x="0" height="1136" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="game_bag_png" x="558" y="-15"/>
	<e:Image source="open_logo_png" x="1" y="5"/>
	<e:Group id="openGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Rect id="openBtn" height="188" width="192" x="224" y="370"/>
		<e:Image id="openBg" source="open_open_png" y="538" x="320" touchEnabled="false" anchorOffsetX="273" anchorOffsetY="308"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="openedGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="-20" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Rect id="myPrizeBtn" height="63" width="220" x="351" y="840"/>
		<e:Rect id="ruleBtn" height="62" width="217" x="72" y="840"/>
		<e:Rect id="againBtn" height="166" width="175" x="229" y="625"/>
		<e:Image id="opened_openedBg_up" source="open_opened2.png_png" x="48" y="205" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image id="prize1" source="prize1_png" x="-3" y="40" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image id="prize2" source="prize2_png" x="0" y="61" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image id="prize3" source="prize3_png" x="0" y="44"/>
		<e:Image id="prize4" source="prize4_png" x="18" y="30"/>
		<e:Image id="prize5" source="prize5_png" x="-2" y="36"/>
		<e:Image id="prize6" source="prize6_png" x="-16" y="38"/>
		<e:Image id="prize7" source="prize7_png" x="-2" y="38"/>
		<e:Image id="prize8" source="prize8_png" x="134" y="122"/>
		<e:Image id="openedBg" x="48" y="208" touchEnabled="false" source="open_opened.png_png"/>
		<e:Label id="prizeResultLabel" x="48" y="522" width="545" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="40" height="56" textColor="0xF2E717"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="phoneGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Rect id="phoneRect" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
		<e:Rect id="submitBtn" height="46" width="190" x="223" y="557"/>
		<e:Image id="phoneTextBg" source="prize_phone_png" y="378" touchEnabled="false" x="89"/>
		<e:EditableText id="phoneLabel" width="354" height="48" x="136" y="429" textColor="0x000000" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label text="技术支持：信步游戏" width="360" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" bottom="25" x="140"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="anim1" source="load_anim1_png" x="211" y="266"/>
	<e:Image id="anim0" source="load_anim0_png" x="221" y="265"/>
	<e:Image id="barbg" source="load_barbg_png" y="460" x="91"/>
	<e:Image id="bar" source="load_bar_png" y="460" x="92" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Image id="anim2" source="load_anim2_png" x="208" y="269"/>
	<e:Image id="anim3" source="load_anim3_png" x="208" y="267"/>
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" text="100%" y="497" textColor="0xEACB21" fontFamily="Arial" width="164" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="238"/>
	<e:Label text="技术支持：信步游戏" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="360" verticalAlign="middle" x="150" bottom="65" textColor="0xFAFAF6"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CountDownUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.8"/>
	<e:Image id="num3" source="count3_png" y="177" x="206"/>
	<e:Image id="num2" source="count2_png" x="204" y="180"/>
	<e:Image id="num1" source="count1_png" x="214" y="172"/>
	<e:Image source="count_rule_png" y="532" x="81"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MyPrizeUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Rect id="okBtn" height="52" width="198" x="230" y="565"/>
	<e:Image source="prize_result_png" x="100" y="264" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label id="contentLabel1" y="406" textColor="0x471717" text="标签" width="394" height="35" x="130"/>
	<e:Label id="contentLabel0" text="标签" x="130" y="356" width="394" height="35" textColor="0x471717"/>
	<e:Label y="521" textColor="0x471717" id="contentLabel2" width="394" height="35" horizontalCenter="0" text="点击奖品名称可查看详情" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="25" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	<e:Image source="phone_bg_png" y="690" x="20"/>
	<e:Group id="detailGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0xFEB431"/>
		<e:Rect id="codeBg" height="36" width="350" y="532" fillColor="0xFEFAFA" x="145"/>
		<e:Image id="detail_title" source="detail_title_png" y="12" x="102"/>
		<e:Image id="detail_logo" source="detail_log_png" x="47" bottom="68"/>
		<e:Group id="detail7" height="1136" width="640">
			<e:Image source="detail7_03_png" x="61" y="178"/>
			<e:Image source="detail7_07_png" x="89" y="620"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="detail6" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0">
			<e:Image source="detail6_03_png" x="62" y="178"/>
			<e:Image source="detail6_07_png" x="88" y="620"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="detail5" width="640" y="0" height="1136" x="0">
			<e:Image source="detail5_03_png" x="58" y="180"/>
			<e:Image source="detail5_07_png" x="78" y="600"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="detail4" width="640" y="0" height="1136" x="0">
			<e:Image source="detail4_03_png" x="64" y="174"/>
			<e:Image source="detail4_07_png" x="80" y="610"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="detail3" width="640" y="0" height="1136" x="0">
			<e:Image source="detail3_03_png" x="62" y="173"/>
			<e:Image source="detail3_07_png" x="78" y="608"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="detail2" width="640" y="0" height="1136" x="0">
			<e:Image source="detail2_03_png" x="54" y="176"/>
			<e:Image source="detail2_07_png" x="76" y="612"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="detail1" width="640" y="0" height="1136" x="0">
			<e:Image source="detail1_03_png" x="56" y="174"/>
			<e:Image source="detail1_07_png" x="80" y="610"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Label id="codeLabel" text="兑奖号：123123123123" y="534" textColor="0x040000" width="348" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="25" height="32" x="146" touchEnabled="true"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Rect id="openPacketBtn" height="150" width="150" x="247" y="402"/>
	<e:Rect id="prizeBtn" height="62" width="218" x="349" y="565"/>
	<e:Rect id="againBtn" height="66" width="212" x="83" y="565"/>
	<e:Image id="resultbg" source="game_resultbg_png" y="230" x="38" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="game_bag_png" x="559" y="-15" touchEnabled="true"/>
	<e:Label id="countLabel" text="你数了xxx个红包" y="318" width="398" height="44" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="121"/>
	<e:Label id="fightLabel" y="362" text="打败了xxxx个人" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="398" height="44" x="121"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RuleUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image id="bg" source="rule_bg_png" y="127" x="90"/>
	<e:Scroller id="scroller" width="373" height="487" x="129" y="208" skinName="skins.ScrollerSkin">
		<e:Group>
			<e:Image source="rule_content_png" x="11" y="-1"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image id="okBtn" source="rule_btn_png" y="729" x="223"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ShareUISkin" width="640" height="1150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image id="haveChance" source="share0_png" x="127" y="18"/>
	<e:Image id="noChance" source="share1_png" x="126" y="17"/>
</e:Skin>
